name: Semih Şahinoğlu
title: Software Engineering Student
about: I’m a third-year software engineering student deeply passionate about Fullstack development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Java, Typescript and MongoDB, I thrive in dynamic environments where innovation and collaboration drive success. With a track record of delivering solutions, I’m eager to contribute my skills to real-world projects and collaborate with industry professionals to build remarkable experiences
shortAbout: A passionate software engineering student in Computer

projects.name: Adventure Game
projects.description: It was a simple Java project based on OOP. In this project i have learned how to use OOP's features such as how to use Abstract Classes, Inheritance, Polymorphism.

projects.name: Live Chat App
projects.description: Fullstack applications, such as React, Node.js, MongoDB and Express.js, is a live message application that I made to improve myself in this project. With As a Programmer Youtube
